mapper.select: select artist_no, artist_name, artist_nation, artist_company, artist_type, artist_group, artist_member, artist_profile, artist_info1, artist_info2 from artist
select artist_no, artist_name, artist_nation, artist_company, artist_type, artist_group, artist_member, artist_profile, artist_info1, artist_info2 from artist where artist_no=#{artist_no}

select artist_no, artist_name, artist_nation, artist_company, artist_type, artist_group, artist_member, artist_profile, artist_info1, artist_info2 from artist where artist_name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
mapper.insert: insert into artist (artist_no, artist_name, artist_nation, artist_company, artist_type, artist_group, artist_member, artist_profile, artist_info1, artist_info2 ) values ( (select nvl(max(artist_no),0)+1 from artist), #{artist_name }, #{artist_nation }, #{artist_company }, #{artist_type} , #{artist_group }, #{artist_member }, #{artist_profile }, #{artist_info1 }, #{artist_info2 })
mapper.update: update artist set artist_name=#{artist_name }, artist_nation=#{artist_nation }, artist_company=#{artist_company }, artist_type=#{artist_type}, artist_group=#{artist_group }, artist_member=#{artist_member }, artist_profile=#{artist_profile }, artist_info1=#{artist_info1 }, artist_info2=#{artist_info2 } where artist_no=#{artist_no}
mapper.select: select a_no, a_name, a_cover, a_date, a_publishing, a_agency ,artist.artist_name from album album join artist artist using(artist_no) order by a_no

select a_no, a_name, a_cover, a_date, a_publishing, a_agency ,artist.artist_name from album album join artist artist using(artist_no) where artist.artist_name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or album.a_name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by a_no
mapper.insert: insert into album (a_no, a_name, a_cover, a_date, a_publishing, a_agency, a_introduce1, a_introduce2, artist_no ) values ( (select nvl(max(a_no),0)+1 from album) ,#{a_name }, #{a_cover }, #{a_date} , #{a_publishing }, #{a_agency }, #{a_introduce1 }, #{a_introduce2 }, #{artist_no })
mapper.select: select a_no, a_name, a_cover, a_date, a_publishing, a_agency, a_introduce1, a_introduce2, artist.artist_no, artist.artist_name from album album join artist artist on album.artist_no = artist.artist_no where a_no=#{a_no}

select t2.* from (select rownum rnum, t1.* from (select sound.s_no, sound.a_no, sound.s_name, sound.s_lyrics1, sound.s_lyrics2, sound.s_age_yn, sound.s_path, album.artist_no, album.a_name, album.a_cover from sound sound join album album on sound.a_no=album.a_no)t1)t2
where rnum < 21

select artist.artist_name, artist.artist_no from sound sound join singer singer on sound.s_no=singer.s_no and sound.a_no=singer.a_no join artist artist on singer.artist_no = artist.artist_no where sound.a_no=#{a_no} and sound.s_no=#{s_no}

select sound.a_no, album.a_name, album.a_cover , sound.s_no, sound.s_name, artist.artist_name from album album join sound sound on album.a_no = sound.a_no join singer singer singer.a_no = sound.a_no and sound.s_no = sound.s_no join artist artist on singer.artist_no = artist.artist_no where artist.artist_name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or sound.s_name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by a_no
